Query: SELECT DISTINCT nimi FROM hotell GROUP BY NIMI;
SELECT * FROM hotell h JOIN reserveerimine r ON r.hotelli_nr = h.hotelli_nr JOIN külaline k ON k.külalise_nr = r.külalise_nr;
SELECT * FROM Ruum UNION SELECT * FROM Ruum_koopia;
SELECT Hotell.hotelli_nr, nimi, Count(Reserveerimine.hotelli_nr) AS arv FROM Reserveerimine RIGHT JOIN Hotell ON Hotell.hotelli_nr = Reserveerimine.hotelli_nr;
SELECT Hotell.hotelli_nr, nimi, Count(Reserveerimine.hotelli_nr) AS arv FROM Reserveerimine LEFT JOIN Hotell ON Hotell.hotelli_nr = Reserveerimine.hotelli_nr GROUP BY Hotell.hotelli_nr, nimi;
SELECT hotelli_nr, ruumi_nr, Count(külalise_nr) as külalineCount from Reserveerimine group by hotelli_nr;
INSERT INTO Külaline_koopia SELECT * FROM Külaline;
